Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.ir

Class QLJMSimilarity

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.GraphSimilarity
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.ir.QLJMSimilarity
All Implemented Interfaces:
es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.nn.sim.Similarity
public class QLJMSimilarity
extends GraphSimilarity
Similarity based on the Query Likelihood IR model with Jelinek-Mercer smoothing.
See Also:
QLJM
